platform.summary: Plant Genome Integrative Explorer Galaxy instance
comments: The [Plant Genome Integrative Explorer](http://plantgenie.org/) is a collection of interoperable web resources for searching, visualizing and analyzing genomics and transcriptomics data for different plant species.
citations: [The Plant Genome Integrative Explorer Resource: PlantGenIE.org](https://doi.org/10.1111/nph.13557) by David Sundell, Chanaka Mannapperuma, Sergiu Netotea, Nicolas Delhomme, Yao-Cheng Lin, Andreas Sjödin, Yves Van de Peer, Stefan Jansson, Torgeir R. Hvidsten, Nathaniel R. Street, *New Phytologist* (July 2015), doi:10.1111/nph.13557
